response.overview: Four idiots on a heist, a shit ton of neon lube, and a Gimp in the back of a quaint sex shop. What could go wrong?  Before Wolf splits for the coast, he and his idiotic companions known as THE HOMETOWN BOYS have one last heist, steal a pink lockbox from a seedy Scranton porn store. But there's a catch, a slippery one at that, the store's security guard, a Gimp, is ready to kick their asses back to reality. Will they run off with the loot or face the wrath of the relentless Gimp?
response.title: Hometown Boys
